trans-unit.source: Represents the area of a page that can be printed.
trans-unit.target: 表示页面可打印区域。

trans-unit.source: Most laser and inkjet printers must leave an unprinted area around the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets.
trans-unit.target: 大多数激光和喷墨打印机必须留围绕页后，可以防止墨粉移动工作表的打印机的部分上边缘的页面的区域。

trans-unit.source: For many photographic printers, however, the entire page is imageable.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对于许多照片打印机，整个页面均可打印图像。

trans-unit.source: For a class that includes the same information about the imageable area as <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea> and also includes page size, see <xref:System.Printing.PrintDocumentImageableArea>.
trans-unit.target: 包括有关作为成像区域的相同信息的类<xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea>和还包括页面大小，请参阅<xref:System.Printing.PrintDocumentImageableArea>。

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: 类中<xref:System.Printing>命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the imageable area.
trans-unit.target: 获取成像区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the height of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 表示以像素为单位的成像区域高度（1/96 英寸）的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentHeight%2A> property gets the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the lower-left corner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentHeight%2A>属性可获取成像区域 （也称为成像区域的"源"） 的左上角到左下角的距离。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the imageable area.
trans-unit.target: 获取成像区域的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the width of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 表示以像素为单位的成像区域宽度（1/96 英寸）的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentWidth%2A> property gets the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the upper-right corner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentWidth%2A>属性可获取成像区域 （也称为成像区域的"源"） 的左上角到右上角的距离。

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin height, which is the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the nearest point on the top edge of the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取原点高度，即从成像区域左上角（也称为成像区域的“原点”）到页面上边缘最近的点的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance from the top edge of the page to the top of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 表示以像素为单位的页面上边缘到成像区域顶部的距离（1/96 英寸）的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin width, which is the distance from the left edge of the page to the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area).
trans-unit.target: 获取原点宽度，即页面左边缘到成像区域左上角（也称为成像区域的“原点”）的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance from the left edge of the page to the left edge of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 表示以像素为单位的页面左边缘到成像区域左边缘的距离（1/96 英寸）的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageImageableArea" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageImageableArea" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the property values of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageImageableArea" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的属性值的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageImageableArea" />。

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned has the following format:
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串具有以下格式：

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.OriginWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.OriginHeight%2A>), (<xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentHeight%2A>)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.OriginWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.OriginHeight%2A>), (<xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Printing.PageImageableArea.ExtentHeight%2A>)
